targets.query:
from(bucket: "weather")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "weather")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.sensor == "outdoor" or r.sensor == "indoor" or r.sensor == "office" or r.sensor == "backroom")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (r._field == "temperature"))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "weather")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "weather")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.sensor == "outdoor" or r.sensor == "indoor" or r.sensor == "office" or r.sensor == "backroom")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "humidity")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "weather")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "weather")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.sensor == "outdoor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (r._field == "dew_point"))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "weather")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "weather")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.sensor == "outdoor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (r._field == "pressure"))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "weather")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "weather")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.sensor == "outdoor" or r.sensor == "indoor" or r.sensor == "office" or r.sensor == "backroom")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (r._field == "temperature"))
  |> max(column: "_value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "power")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "power")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "solar_generation")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "power")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "power")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "home_usage")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

import "math"
import "strings"

from(bucket: "power")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "power")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "grid_flow")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value < 0)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: math.abs(x: r._value)}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _field: strings.replaceAll(v: r._field, t: "grid_flow", u: "exported")}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

import "math"
import "strings"

from(bucket: "power")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "power")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "grid_flow")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value > 0)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: math.abs(x: r._value)}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _field: strings.replaceAll(v: r._field, t: "grid_flow", u: "imported")}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "weather")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "weather")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.sensor == "outdoor" or r.sensor == "indoor" or r.sensor == "office" or r.sensor == "backroom")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (r._field == "temperature"))
  |> min(column: "_value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

import "strings"

from(bucket: "weather")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "weather")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.sensor == strings.toLower(v: "${location}"))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "temperature")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

import "strings"

from(bucket: "weather")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "weather")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.sensor == strings.toLower(v: "${location}"))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "humidity")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "power")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "power")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "solar_generation" or r._field == "home_usage" or r._field == "grid_flow" or r._field == "battery_flow" or r._field == "battery_charge_percentage")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "air-quality")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "air-quality")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] =~ /^PM/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "air-quality")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "air-quality")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "Particles>0.3µm/0.1Lair" or r._field == "Particles>0.5µm/0.1Lair" or r._field == "Particles>1.0µm/0.1Lair")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "air-quality")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "air-quality")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "Particles>2.5µm/0.1Lair" or r._field == "Particles>5.0µm/0.1Lair" or r._field == "Particles>10.0µm/0.1Lair")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")
